• Investments on-the-go! The investing tab now allows you to buy or sell global Mutual Funds at any time
• Use SC Mobile App to Pay for goods and services by simply scanning QR barcodes at selected merchant stores and websites
• SC Keyboard allows you to send money from your account and view balances through your keyboard without accessing SC Mobile App
